statement.p: Out of the last 41 days, it rained 17 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{41}}={0.41463414634146}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.41463414634146}={41.463414634146} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 41.46 .
